name: Alpha Contact
description:
My biggest game, previously released on game jolt. 

https://gamejolt.com/games/Alphac/354302

Asteroids meets Enter the dungeon in the desolate territory of an unknown alien race.

Alpha Contact sees you exploring the hostile environment of an unknown race of creatures whos civilization has crumbled. Whilst fighting against their aggressive response to any strange and unknown creatures that show up in fear of extinction.

What do you do?
Well, you play the game I suppose. Who knows who the player is, that's up to you to decide depending on how you interpret the game.

Controls to keep in mind:

  • mouse and both mouse buttons
  • W-A-S-D
  • Space

Mechanically the game functions like a roguelike. Every run will give you slightly different combat scenarios and new parts of the lore.
